explanation: [0-0] A pile of sand is in an iron basin, with a cement floor in the background.

[0-2] A pair of hands holds a shovel handle and places it on the sand. One hand uses an iron rod to hammer the shovel handle into the sand. Then, the shovel handle is taken out, leaving an imprint of the shovel handle in the sand.

[0-2] A pair of hands holds a shovel handle and places it on the sand. One hand uses an iron rod to hammer the shovel handle into the sand. Then, the shovel handle is taken out, leaving an imprint of the shovel handle in the sand.

[2-4] Then, the pair of hands moves the shovel handle to the other side and uses the iron rod to hammer it into the sand again. Subsequently, the shovel handle is taken out, leaving another imprint in the sand.

[4-7] Next, a pair of hands uses the iron rod to hit a metal tool, poking several holes in the sand below the shovel handle imprint, and then poking several holes above the shovel handle imprint.

[7-9] Subsequently, a pair of hands picks up an iron cone and places it in the middle of the shovel handle imprint. They then use the iron rod to hammer the iron cone into the sand. The iron cone is taken out, leaving an imprint.

[9-15] Then, molten metal is slowly poured into the shovel-shaped mold in the sand. One hand holds an iron rod and pokes the molten metal.

[15-20] Finally, one hand uses the iron rod to pry up the cooled and solidified metal. The other hand uses pliers to clamp the handle of the metal shovel, takes it out from the sand, and places it on a piece of metal. A brand new metal shovel is made. One hand then uses a brush to clean the sand off the shovel.
